ValidationRule.description: If "Type of 401k NSF" is "Contributions", then the following fields are required: "401k NSF Amount - Contrib." and "Contribution NSF Alert Date".
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL( Type_of_NSF__c , "Contributions")&& ( ISBLANK( Outstanding_401k_NSF_Amount_Contribut__c )|| ISBLANK( Contribution_NSF_Date__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If the NSF Type is Contributions, you must enter a value in "401k NSF Amount - Contrib." and "Contribution NSF Alert Date"
